com.tencent.tcr.sdk.api.datachannel

Interface DataChannel


  • public interface DataChannel
    Data channel APIs

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STATUS_CLOSED
      Status code: The connection was closed.
      static int STATUS_REACH_MAXIMUM
      Status code: The length of the data exceeded the limit.
      static int STATUS_SUCCESS
      Status code: The data was sent successfully.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the data channel.
      int send(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
      Call this API to send data to the remote UDP port.

    • Field Detail

      • STATUS_SUCCESS

        static final int STATUS_SUCCESS
        Status code: The data was sent successfully.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATUS_REACH_MAXIMUM

        static final int STATUS_REACH_MAXIMUM
        Status code: The length of the data exceeded the limit.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATUS_CLOSED

        static final int STATUS_CLOSED
        Status code: The connection was closed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • send

        int send(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
        Call this API to send data to the remote UDP port.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to be sent, which cannot exceed 1,200 bytes in each sending request.
        Returns:
        STATUS_SUCCESS The data was sent successfully. STATUS_REACH_MAXIMUM The length of the data to be sent exceeded the limit. STATUS_CLOSED The connection was closed.

      • close

        void close()
        Close the data channel.
